unnormalised: HDFC Bank announced a special Diwali offer on personal loans, starting 15/10/2024! Folks can now get loans up to ₹25 lakh with minimal documentation. Sounds pretty sweet, right?
normalised: H-D-F-C Bank announced a special Diwali offer on personal loans, starting fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four! Folks can now get loans up to rupee twenty five lakh with minimal documentation. Sounds pretty sweet, right?

unnormalised: The interest rates are starting from 10.5% p.a., which, let's be honest, is competitive in this market. Plus, they're promising quick disbursal - within 24 hrs! Perfect for those last-minute Diwali shopping sprees, bhai.
normalised: The interest rates are starting from ten point five percent p.a., which, let's be honest, is competitive in this market. Plus, they're promising quick disbursal - within twenty four hours! Perfect for those last-minute Diwali shopping sprees, bhai.

unnormalised: SBI is also in the mix. They’ve launched a pre-approved 2-wheeler loan scheme. Eligibility’s the key, of course, but interest rates start at just 8.4%, but I am unsure about the processing fee.
normalised: S-B-I is also in the mix. They've launched a pre-approved two-wheeler loan scheme. Eligibility's the key, of course, but interest rates start at just eight point four percent, but I am unsure about the processing fee.

unnormalised: Kotak Mahindra Bank is prepping to pre-pone the launch of a unique credit card that's focused on travel rewards! They're hinting it'll rival the HDFC Regalia, with benefits worth 20000 Rs. annually, so expect a big splash around 20/11/2024.
normalised: Kotak Mahindra Bank is prepping to pre-pone the launch of a unique credit card that's focused on travel rewards! They're hinting it'll rival the H-D-F-C Regalia, with benefits worth twenty thousand rupees annually, so expect a big splash around twentieth November two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Just a heads up, though! Always check the fine print. EMI calculations and hidden charges are a real thing, you know? Don't get caught out.
normalised: Just a heads up, though! Always check the fine print. E-M-I calculations and hidden charges are a real thing, you know? Don't get caught out.
